title: [Large-Scale] HELS-Based Social Theme Competency Development Simulation Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental concepts in secondary social studies, basic proficiency in using digital devices (smartphones)
context.additional_context: Mobile learning environment utilizing smartphones, centered on simulation activities for solving social issues

learning_goals: Students can apply a 4-stage (Understand-Apply-Transfer-Innovate) thinking framework for solving social issues with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can propose actionable solutions three or more times after analyzing real-world social phenomena via VR simulations.
In team project-based assessments, students achieve an "Excellent" grade in three or more of the four competency dimensions (Knowledge, Skills, Attitudes, Creativity).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
